reviews.review_msg: Professor Meyer is awesome! Took 2 courses w/her. It is usually 40% paper, 40% final, 20% part. You make your paper topic, she gives you previous exams to study from for final, plus a presentation. She looks for a lot of analysis & critical thinking. Extremely fair marker. Really kind, funny, interesting woman!

shes traveled everywhere she teaches about! Yes, the course is a little dry but shes an easy marker compared to some of the other **** profs. And shes friendly and easy to talk to, definitely will take her again!!
